#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

#define mod 998244353
#define MAX_N 4001

long long nchoosek[MAX_N][MAX_N];

void precompute() {
    for (int i = 0; i < MAX_N; i++) {
        nchoosek[i][0] = 1;
        nchoosek[i][i] = 1;
    }
    for (int i = 2; i < MAX_N; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j < i; j++) {
            nchoosek[i][j] = (nchoosek[i-1][j] + nchoosek[i-1][j-1]) % mod;
        }
    }
}

int main() {
    precompute();

    int k, n;
    scanf("%d %d", &k, &n);

    // Compute first program's outputs and build first_output string
    char first_output[40960] = "";
    for (int i = 2; i <= 2*k; i++) {
        int pairs;
        if (i > k) {
            pairs = k - i/2;
        } else {
            pairs = (i-1)/2;
        }
        int active = k - 2*pairs;
        if (i % 2 == 0) active -= 1;

        long long total = 0;
        long long times2 = 1;
        for (int j = 0; j <= pairs; j++) {
            long long choice = (times2 * nchoosek[pairs][j]) % mod;
            times2 = (times2 * 2) % mod;
            if (active + j - 1 < 0) continue;
            long long term1 = choice * nchoosek[n + active -1][active + j -1];
            if (i % 2 == 0) {
                long long term2 = choice * nchoosek[n + active -2][active + j -1];
                total = (total + term1 + term2) % mod;
            } else {
                total = (total + term1) % mod;
            }
        }
        // Append to first_output
        char temp[20];
        sprintf(temp, "%lld", total % mod); // Ensure mod is applied
        strcat(first_output, temp);
    }

    // Process second program's logic
    int score = 0;
    int len = strlen(first_output);
    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
        char my = (i % 2 == 0) ? 'g' : 'p';
        char his = first_output[i];
        if (my != his) {
            if (my == 'p') {
                score += 1;
            } else {
                score -= 1;
            }
        }
    }

    // Convert score to string
    char score_str[20];
    sprintf(score_str, "%d", score);

    // Process third program's logic
    char final_output[20] = "";
    int s = 0; // boolean: 0 is false, 1 is true
    int slen = strlen(score_str);
    for (int i = 0; i < slen; i++) {
        char c = score_str[i];
        if (c == '.') {
            if (s) {
                strcat(final_output, "1");
                s = 0;
            } else {
                strcat(final_output, "0");
            }
        } else {
            if (s) {
                strcat(final_output, "2");
                s = 0;
            } else {
                s = 1;
            }
        }
    }

    printf("%s\n", final_output);

    return 0;
}
